section.p: The enemy ship’s hold is full of slaves, many of whom are wealthy men. You are rewarded with for freeing them.
‘What shall we do with the surviving Uttakin, cap’n?’ asks the master at arms.
‘Leave them to the mercy of their former captives,’ you tell him. ‘We’ve bigger fish to fry elsewhere.’

After surviving such a tough scrape you might go up in Rank. ,
and if the result is greater than your current Rank then you gain a Rank. You also gain 1-6 Stamina points permanently: increase your normal (unwounded) Stamina score by the roll of one die. Remember that going up a Rank increases your Defence by 1.
